creator: mani_nmk07@yahoo.com
text:
Sir 
   
 I am using window XP 
  I am a new user of rApache http server, I am currenty working on 
perl-cgi scripts, when i  compiled the script using server it show a 
message Internal server error (500). I gone through the documentation file 
and followed as per documentation, as follows
   
  1. I checked the header part (#!/usr/bin/perl) it is correct in my 
file.
  2. I checked the environment variables (ENV) i altered the entire 
path that is c:\ ....
  \cgi-bin\
  3. I again ran the server again it showed the same message Internal 
server error (500).  
  4. Note all the files that i want to compile is in cgi-bin directory
  5. Note the script i wrote is getting compiled in perl interpreter. 
show syntax is fine.
  6. script contains vaild HTML tags
  7. I tried all the best to configure but no.
   
  kindly treat the above mail because i need ur advise. If i am wrong 
with any other part, kindly correct me regarding subscription, since i 
am a newuser to the above
   
  regards
   
  N. Mani

creator: nick@webthing.com
text:
Please address support questions to an appropriate forum such as the users list,
once you've checked your error log.
